scripts.deploy: npm run build:vectors && astro build && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.build:vectors: tsc scripts/buildVectorDB.ts src/utils/vectorSearch.ts --outDir dist --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --esModuleInterop true --skipLibCheck true && node dist/scripts/buildVectorDB.js
scripts.test:search: tsc scripts/testSearch.ts src/utils/vectorSearch.ts --outDir dist --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --esModuleInterop true --skipLibCheck true && node dist/scripts/testSearch.js
